description: A hernia that occurs in the anterior portion of the diaphragm, specifically in the area of the Morgagni foramen.

attributes.name: Presence of Morgagni Hernia
attributes.description: Whether a Morgagni Hernia is present or not

attributes.name: Side
attributes.description: The side of the Morgagni Hernia

values.name: Left
values.description: Morgagni Hernia is on the left side

values.name: Right
values.description: Morgagni Hernia is on the right side

values.name: Bilateral
values.description: Morgagni Hernia is on both sides

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: The size of the Morgagni Hernia

values.name: Small
values.description: Morgagni Hernia is small in size

values.name: Medium
values.description: Morgagni Hernia is medium in size

values.name: Large
values.description: Morgagni Hernia is large in size

attributes.name: Contents
attributes.description: The contents of the Morgagni Hernia

values.name: Both
values.description: Morgagni Hernia contains both fat and bowel

attributes.name: Cardiac or Mediastinal Displacement
attributes.description: Whether there is associated cardiac or mediastinal displacement

values.name: Present
values.description: Associated cardiac or mediastinal displacement is present

values.name: Absent
values.description: Associated cardiac or mediastinal displacement is absent

attributes.name: Other Diaphragmatic Hernias
attributes.description: Whether there are other diaphragmatic hernias present
